analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/18/0xfc2c858d2dc582a7db9d25224fe11ba0dd1533ee.sol:
	Contract SparksterToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/18/0xfc2c858d2dc582a7db9d25224fe11ba0dd1533ee.sol#207-208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/18/0xfc2c858d2dc582a7db9d25224fe11ba0dd1533ee.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/18/0xfc2c858d2dc582a7db9d25224fe11ba0dd1533ee.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/18/0xfc2c858d2dc582a7db9d25224fe11ba0dd1533ee.sol#76-77) is not in mixedCase
